name: mcextreme
short_description:
Mcextreme will most likely have all things including ctf,lava survival,tnt wars,zombie survival, and freebuild.
It was thought up by maximumride67 and is going to extensively provide a full version of the software and a classic version. It is based on almost all softwares for minecraft yet. Also having at least 91% of all commands possible. I made this software to provide an easier way to play minecraft. It is also a software that will allow you to chat on global to all servers from all softwares. I hope you enjoy
summary: Mcextreme is a new software for minecraft
